name: Titans in the Sky - Prototype Version
name_original: Titans in the Sky - Prototype Version
description:
This is the first prototype for "Titans in the Sky", a new top-down shooter where spaceships will fight against a menace coming from the outer space.

======== CONTROL ========
W/S/A/D   Move
Mouse   Focus/Point
Left Click   Shoot
Right Click   Dash
R   Reload
Space   EMP

======== STORY ========
After an out-of-control artificial intelligence captured Earth's military weaponry and imprisoned most of its inhabitants, a resistance group has been created: the last chance to end this threat before humanity is destroyed.

======== PLANS ========
Titans in the Sky is planning to incorporate a switch mechanic on-the-fly, where you'll change between different ships; once you lost one, however, is gone, and you'll have to keep fighting with the pilots alive.

Your comments and feedback is truly appreciated! Follow BeWolf Studio to get more info very soon about the game and the full release!

Thank you for playing!!
